name: ecommerce-website-nodejs
description: e-commerce website using MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, React and Node.JS)

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix ecommerce-backend-nodejs"  "npm run dev --prefix ecommerce-frontend-nodejs"
scripts.build: cd ecommerce-backend-nodejs && npm install && npm run build  && cd ../ecommerce-frontend-nodejs && npm install && npm run build
